subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This library provides a Key Diversification service.
It could be used by an Identity Provider (IDP) to give a specific Identity Key for each Service Provider (SP) corresponding to the same Identity.

subsection.name: Service
subsection.p:
The entry point of the library is the service fr.paris.lutece.util.keydiversification.DiversificationService. This service provides:
a method to get a SP key from the IDP key
a method to get the IDP key from a SP key
